trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.Click"></xref> event of an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap"></xref> control.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.Click> event is raised when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> object in an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> control is clicked.

To allow a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> object to raise the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.Click> event, you must first set either the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to `HotSpotMode.PostBack`.

To control the actions programmatically that are performed when a postback <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> is clicked, provide an event handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.Click> event.
A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.PostBackValue%2A> property stores a string that is associated with the behavior of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> object when clicked.
This string is passed in the ImageMapEventArgs event data when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> is clicked.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMapEventArgs"></xref> class.
Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMapEventArgs> class.
The following table shows initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMapEventArgs> class.
|Property|Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMapEventArgs.PostBackValue%2A>|The string assigned to the `value` parameter.|
The <xref:System.String> object assigned to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.PostBackValue*> property of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot"></xref> object that was clicked.
Gets the <xref:System.String> assigned to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.PostBackValue*> property of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot"></xref> object that was clicked.

Use this property to programmatically access the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.PostBackValue%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> object in an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> control that was clicked.
The <xref:System.String> assigned to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.PostBackValue*> property of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot"></xref> object that was clicked.
